name: Callable -Â Add Salesforce Case Comment for Cases Related to Jira
description: You will specify a Jira Key and a Comment.  This recipe will find all Salesforce Cases related to this Jira and add the comment to the Case.

code.name: receive_request
code.description: New call for Add Salesforce Case Comment for Cases Related to Jira

input.service_name: Add Salesforce Case Comment for Cases Related to Jira

block.name: search_sobjects
block.title: Search Jira- case associations
block.description: Search for Jira- case associations in Salesforce

extended_input_schema.name: include_combined_attachments
extended_input_schema.label: Select combined attachments
extended_input_schema.hint: Select Yes to obtain data from notes, attachments and files associated to the queried records. Default value is Yes.

block.comment: get all the Cases associated with this Jira

block.name: create_custom_object
block.title: Create Case comment
block.comment: Create a private comment for the case.

block.name: update_sobject
block.title: Update Case

extended_input_schema.name: id
extended_input_schema.label: Case ID
extended_input_schema.hint: Salesforce internal ID of Case to update

extended_input_schema.name: assignment_rule_id
extended_input_schema.label: Assignment rule ID
extended_input_schema.hint: Leave empty to not apply assignment rules; the special value true to apply the default assignment rules; or pass specific rule ID.

extended_input_schema.name: INTERNALAccountManagerEmailInEmail__c
extended_input_schema.label: INTERNAL: account manager email in email

extended_input_schema.name: INTERNALAtRiskNotificationMailSent__c
extended_input_schema.label: INTERNAL: at risk notification mail sent

toggle_field.label: INTERNAL: at risk notification mail sent
toggle_field.name: INTERNALAtRiskNotificationMailSent__c

extended_input_schema.name: IsLastCommentOrEmailFromCustomer__c
extended_input_schema.label: Is LastComment Or Email From Customer?

toggle_field.label: Is LastComment Or Email From Customer?
toggle_field.name: IsLastCommentOrEmailFromCustomer__c

extended_input_schema.name: IsPublicCaseCommentCreatedFlag__c
extended_input_schema.label: Is Public Case Comment Created Flag

toggle_field.label: Is Public Case Comment Created Flag
toggle_field.name: IsPublicCaseCommentCreatedFlag__c

extended_input_schema.name: StandardMSCSESev1CaseEmail__c
extended_input_schema.label: Standard MS CSE Sev1 Case Email

block.comment: If the customer comms field is changed in jira then update the case to "Open" status in sfdc.

block.name: accumulate_list_items
block.title: Accumulate items to cases_updated list
block.comment: Track which cases had a comment added.
Do not add a comment to the case is closed

block.name: send_reply
block.description: Return response from Add Salesforce Case Comment for Cases Related to Jira

code.comment: You will specify a Jira Key and a Comment.Â  This recipe will find all Salesforce Cases related to this Jira and add the comment to the Case.
